name: Flutter (Mobile) Developer
description:
We expand our capacities and presence in Minsk, so we are looking for a Strong Middle/Senior Flutter Developer for our Minsk office to assist in our continued growth and contribute to our future developments.

Project Description

The web and mobile Edplatform for online education available for students globally. Team size: 20 members including Product/project manager, tech leader, back-end (PHP) and front developers, QA, data analyst, marketers, designer, content managers.

Required qualifications:

  • 3 years of experience in mobile application development for Android or iOS
  • Commercial experience in Dart / Flutter development. At least one completed Flutter project
  • Experience in publishing applications on the Android Play Market / iOS App Store
  • Experience with the Provider architectural pattern
  • Experience with UI / UX, REST API, Cross-platform
  • Working with DB (SQLite, NoSQL DBs)
  • Git at the level of daily use
  • Java / Kotlin / Swift in Android Studio / XCode as plus
  • English level: Intermediate or above

Social package description:

  • Hybrid working model (possibility to work from office/home when needed).
  • High competitive salary.
  • Personal approach to each employee in the company.
  • Online English language courses.
  • Medical insurance.
  • Sports compensation.
  • 25 days vacation plus 5 sick days annually.
  • Purchase of professional literature.
  • Compensation of external training and certification.
  • Corporate events and trips.
  • Presents to employee special events.
